Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Skin Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Skin Disorder/Necrobiosis Lipoidica
Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Skin Diseases, Metabolic/Necrobiosis Lipoidica
Record.Description: A degenerative disease of the dermal connective tissue characterized by the development of erythematous papules or nodules in the pretibial area. The papules form plaques covered with telangiectatic vessels. More than half of the affected patients have diabetes.
